creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: Shiva sits with Parvati on top of a flayed tiger skin.  Shiva wears a necklace of human heads and holds an antelope in his upper left hand, a blade in his upper right, a trident in his lower left, and rudraksha beads in his lower right.
title: Uma Maheshvara (Shiva and Parvati)
